charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(2)(A), 18.3551 et seq., 21.841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(i)), 18.3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-IMPORTATION/EXPORTATION-Deft did import heroin into the U.S. Deft did possess with intent to distribute heroin. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to ct. 1. Remaining cts. dismissed on govt's motion. Defendant assessed $50.00. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons for a term of fourty-six (46) months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(2)(A), 18.3551 et seq., 21.841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(i)), 18.3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-IMPORTATION/EXPORTATION-Deft did import heroin into the U.S. Deft did possess with intent to distribute heroin. (2)
Title 21, U.S.C., Section 952(a)and 960. Importation into the United States from a place outside thereof a substance containing heroin, a schedule 1 narcotic drug controlled substance. [1:92-m-1028]
